```{r setup, include = F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message = F, warning = F)
lapply(c("tidyverse", "kableExtra"), library, character.only = T)
```

```{r table_notes}
kable(tibble(question = c(rep(paste("Question", 1:5), 2), "Code chunk annotation", 
                          "Use of inline code", "Redaction quality", "Overall presentation"),
             grade = c(rep(paste0("/", c(1, 1, 2, 2, 2)), 2), rep("/1", 4))),
      col.names = NULL,
      align = c("lc")) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("condensed"), full_width = F) %>%
  column_spec(1, width_min = "20em") %>%
  pack_rows("Part I: Describe an earnings distribution (8 points)", 1, 5) %>%
  pack_rows("Part II: Visualize intergenerational persistence (8 points)", 6, 10) %>%
  pack_rows("Presentation of the document (4 points)", 11, 14)
```
